    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String nickname, Wizard wiz) throws LobbyFullException, NicknameNotUniqueException, WizardAlreadyChosenException
      Adds the new Player to the GameLobby
      Parameters:
      nickname - (type String) Player's nickname
      wiz - (type Wizard) chosen Wizard
      Throws:
      LobbyFullException - whenever a new Players tries to enter a full GameLobby
      NicknameNotUniqueException - whenever the chosen Nickname is not unique
      WizardAlreadyChosenException - whenever the chosen Wizard has already been chosen

    • startGame

      public MatchManager startGame() throws InvalidPlayerCountException, IncorrectConstructorParametersException
      Starts the game by initializing a new MatchManager
      Returns:
      (type MatchManager) the MatchManager
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerCountException - whenever the Player count isn't correct
      IncorrectConstructorParametersException - whenever the parameters aren't correct
